TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Imaging extends System.Object
public ref class Imaging abstract sealed

summary.span: 为创建图像对象提供托管到非托管的互操作支持。

span.span: Provides managed to unmanaged interoperation support for creating image objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类为中的主位图图像类提供创建机制 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。This class provides creation mechanisms for the primary bitmap imaging class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], . 这包括 基于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] 对象和内存部分创建的方法。This includes methods that create a based on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objects , and memory sections.
